test_module.name: sprint/us48577_infra_heartbeat/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
SET CR } SET CL {
Con1SSH TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH TYPE export TMOUT=0\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH SINK 3 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE cd\n Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE echo executing ${WASSP_TC_NAME}\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
# Check that we have the infra configuration on controller-0 Con1SSH TYPE system host-if-list controller-0 Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [a-z0-9-]{36} \| infra0(\s)*\| infra(\s)*\| ethernet \| \[u\'eth26\'\](\s)*\| [0-9]* \| None Con1SSH WAIT 5 SEC
# Check that we have the infra configuration on controller-1 Con1SSH TYPE system host-if-list controller-1 Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [a-z0-9-]{36} \| infra0(\s)*\| infra(\s)*\| ethernet \| \[u\'eth26\'\](\s)*\| [0-9]* \| None Con1SSH WAIT 5 SEC
# Check that we have the infra configuration on compute-0 Con1SSH TYPE system host-if-list compute-0 Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [a-z0-9-]{36} \| infra0(\s)*\| infra(\s)*\| ethernet \| \[u\'eth26\'\](\s)*\| [0-9]* \| None Con1SSH WAIT 5 SEC
# Check that we have the infra configuration on compute-1 Con1SSH TYPE system host-if-list compute-1 Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [a-z0-9-]{36} \| infra0(\s)*\| infra(\s)*\| ethernet \| \[u\'eth26\'\](\s)*\| [0-9]* \| None Con1SSH WAIT 5 SEC
# Check that we have the infra configuration on storage-0 Con1SSH TYPE system host-if-list storage-1 Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [a-z0-9-]{36} \| infra0(\s)*\| infra(\s)*\| ethernet \| \[u\'eth26\'\](\s)*\| [0-9]* \| None Con1SSH WAIT 5 SEC
# Disable the infra link on compute-0 by logging into the cisco router # LAG is enabled on xe2 and xe9 for compute-0 CALL ./toggle.exp 128.224.150.181 admin windriver xe2 disable
# Retrieve alarms and check that compute-0 is now degraded Con1SSH TYPE system host-list Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [0-9]*(\s)*\| compute-0(\s)*\| compute(\s)*\| unlocked(\s)*\| enabled(\s)*\| degraded(\s)* Con1SSH WAIT 2 SEC
# Check that compute-0 goes from degraded to failed in a few seconds Con1SSH TYPE system host-list Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [0-9]*(\s)*\| compute-0(\s)*\| compute(\s)*\| unlocked(\s)*\| disabled(\s)*\| failed(\s)* Con1SSH WAIT 2 SEC
# Re-enable infra link on compute-0 by logging into the cisco router CALL ./toggle.exp 128.224.150.181 admin windriver xe2 enable
# Check that the infra link is eventually restored Con1SSH TYPE system host-list Con1SSH CONTINUEIF \| [0-9]*(\s)*\| compute-0(\s)*\| compute(\s)*\| unlocked(\s)*\| enabled(\s)*\| available(\s)* Con1SSH WAIT 20 SEC
PASS
